show-welcome.title: Welcome to Azeroth!
show-welcome.description: Now that you have a web account, you need to create a game account. This account will be used to log in to the World of Warcraft client.

congrats.body-welcome: We warmly welcome you to our community! We're delighted to have you here. You're just one step away from enjoying your favorite games for free. Finish creating your game account and start playing now!
congrats.disclaimer: We guarantee the complete security of your data, and you retain full control over your information. If you decide to unsubscribe at any time, we will completely delete all your data from our system.

register.title-server-message: All the information you share with us is like the secret ingredient to your mind-blowing experience! The more we know, the better we can create something truly extraordinary for you. So go ahead, share those details and get ready for something out of this world!

kown-you.title-server-message: Your real name may be used in the future to verify your identity when contacting Admin. By default, your real name will remain hidden from other users.

contact-means.title-server-message: This is what you'll use when logging into websites and mobile apps.

terms-and-conditions.title-server-message: Welcome! By accepting our options, you can dive into a personalized experience full of exclusive offers, exciting news, and much more.

input.email-check-text: The account email will receive special offers, news, and more from our community.
input.term-check-text: I have read and accept the following: Terms and Conditions

bank.title: Master Azeroth with an Exclusive Gold Loan!
bank.description: Elevate your adventure in Azeroth to an epic level with our Gold Loan. Get the financing you need to enhance your gear, expand your treasure collection, or simply enjoy the best in-game experiences to the fullest.

benefits.primary: Apply for your loan and receive your money today.

bank.disclaimer: Loans have interest. Check the 'Loan Guide' section for more details.

primary.title: Payment Notifications
primary.description: You will receive in-game notifications to remind you when your loan is due.

secondary.title: Grace Period
secondary.description: If you don't pay on time, you will have a 15-day grace period to catch up before penalties are applied.

tertiary.title: Consequences of Default
tertiary.description: If you fail to pay, the system will automatically deduct the owed gold from your accounts. If there isn't enough gold, in-game items of equivalent value will be deducted.

loan_guide.title: Loan Guide
loan_guide.complementary_subtitle: Choose the one that best suits your needs

secondary.title: Choose the Ideal Plan for You
secondary.description: Select the perfect plan that fits your needs and enhances your experience.

tertiary.title: Your Gold Package is on its Way!
tertiary.description: In a few minutes, check your in-game mail to receive your valuable package.

quaternary.title: Remember Timely Payment!
quaternary.description: Enjoy the newly arrived gold in your game, but don't forget the payment due date.

plans.title: Discover Our Plans!
plans.subtitle: Clear prices tailored to your needs. Total transparency so you can choose the best for your account!

testimony.title: Hello! üëã
testimony.primary_paragraph: In a distant region of Azeroth, there was once an adventurer named Fizzle who, tempted by an offer of easy gold, decided to take out a loan without thinking twice. Although the gold promised to improve his gear and fill his coffers with treasures, he soon discovered that debts and unfulfilled promises became an overwhelming burden.
testimony.secondary_paragraph: Fizzle learned the hard way: sometimes, greed can lead us down dark paths. Instead of accepting the gold without considering the consequences, it's better to carefully evaluate our options and choose paths that don't lead to despair.
testimony.tertiary_paragraph: So, before making a decision, think it over. Gold may shine, but freedom and peace of mind are far more valuable.

bank_characters.title: Character Selection
bank_characters.description: Choose the character to request the loan. If some characters don't appear, it's because they don't meet the loan requirements.
bank_characters.success-loan: Haha, you've got your gold! But remember, my friend, this deal fills my pockets too. Don't forget your payments, or the interest will make me smile even more!

errors.fails_to_obtain_accounts: Oops! We're having trouble fetching your accounts. Please try again later!
errors.fails_to_obtain_characters: Oops! We're having trouble fetching your characters. Please try again later!

availability.title: Forge Your Legend: Explore the Guilds of Azeroth
availability.description: Discover a world of camaraderie and epic adventures. Find your perfect community among the legendary guilds of World of Warcraft, where friendship and strategy unite to challenge the boundaries of Azeroth.

no-availability.title: No guilds found!
no-availability.description: Be part of the adventure and leave your mark in Azeroth! Create your own guild and gather other heroes to face epic challenges and conquer new horizons. Don‚Äôt wait any longer, your legacy is waiting for you!

loading.title: Loading guilds, please wait
loading.description: We are searching for the available guilds on this server. Please hold on!

incentive.title: Benefits of Belonging to a Guild
incentive.description: Joining a community of players in an MMORPG offers a unique and enriching experience. It allows you to connect with other passionate players, collaborate on exciting challenges, and access exclusive resources that will enhance your gaming experience.

competition.title: Compete with Other Guilds
competition.description: Participate in competitions so your guild can earn exclusive benefits for its members.

events.title: Events of the
events.description: Prizes obtained will be awarded to all guild members during the event. After this period, the challenges will be updated and must be completed again to acquire the benefits.

benefits.title: Benefits

primary.title: Global Event: Resilience in the Capitalist Era
primary.description: Guild leaders hold the power to transform the wealth of their members into unique prizes and exclusive benefits. Join the resistance and help your guild conquer new horizons in this global challenge.

secondary.title: Guild Rewards
secondary.description: Every reward earned by the guild opens the door to exclusive benefits for all its members. Participate and make sure each victory is yours too!

database.title: Your Data is Always Protected.

home-information.congrats: Your feedback is essential to us. If you have any suggestions for improvements, feel free to share them. Together, we make this community thrive!

notice.title: Your Adventure is Safe!

primary.title: An Unmatched and Unique Experience!
primary.description: Dare to face the Lich King with our innovative auto-balancing system, allowing you to complete dungeons solo or with a small group of adventurers. Enjoy the final content of the expansion without complications or limits.

secondary.title: An Unmatched Experience!
secondary.description: On February 1st, our community will launch a progressive WoW 3.3.5 realm with a Twink theme. Every week, new levels will be unlocked for you to enjoy a unique experience.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you visit and use our website. By accessing and using this site, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

infoCollection.title: 1. Information Collection
infoCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you register, fill out forms, subscribe to our newsletter, or communicate with us. We may also automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our site, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

infoUsage.title: 2. Use of Information
infoUsage.content: We use the collected information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, personalize your experience, and fulfill our legal obligations. We will not use your information for purposes other than those described in this policy without your consent.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for their own commercial purposes. We may share information only with trusted service providers who help us operate our website, comply with the law, or protect our rights, always under strict confidentiality agreements.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure.

changes.title: 5. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically.

sections.footer: For more information or inquiries about this policy, visit our

terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.intro: This document sets forth the terms and conditions governing the use of our website. By accessing, browsing, or using our site, you agree to comply with all the clauses outlined below. We recommend reading them carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions of use, as well as all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, we recommend that you do not use this site. Continued use of the site constitutes your acceptance of these terms and any subsequent modifications.

use.title: 2. Use of the Website
use.content: This website is intended solely for informational and personal use purposes. It is prohibited to use the site for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not attempt to access restricted areas of the site, interfere with its operation, or perform any action that may damage, disable, or overload our servers or networks.

liability.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: This website is provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages that may result from the use or inability to use this website, including but not limited to data loss, service interruptions, or any other harm.

changes.title: 4. Changes to the Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will become effective immediately upon publication on this website. It is your responsibility to periodically review these terms to stay informed of any changes. Continued use of the site after the publication of changes constitutes your acceptance of them.

sections.footer: For more information about our services and policies, visit our

disclaimer.title: Intellectual Property Notice
disclaimer.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, is the property of its respective owners and is protected by copyright laws and other intellectual property laws. Reproduction, distribution, modification, or creation of derivative works from the content of this site is not permitted without the prior written permission of the respective owner.
